narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Lehigh Valley Hospital is a Psychiatric Unit provider based in Allentown, PA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $64.4M in Medicaid payments across 1.2M claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $64.4M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
